Translations.Text: sada balakaragiruvavaru alli sancarisuttiruvaru. Nivu avarannu kandare, avaru cadurida muttugalendu bhavisuviri
alli nivu elli nodidaru dharala anugrahagalannu mattu ondu brhat samrajyavanne kanuviri
avara meludupu nunnageya hasiru resme hagu unneyaddagiruvudu mattu avarige belliya kadagagalannu todisalaguvudu mattu avara odeyanu avarige ondu nirmala paniyavannu kudisuvanu
‘‘idu nim'ma pratiphala. Nim'ma sramavu svikrtavagide’’ (endu avarodane helalaguvudu)
dutare, navu i kur‌anannu hanta hantavagi nimage ilisi kottiruvevu
nivu nim'modeyanigagi sahanasilaragiri mattu avara (dhikkarigala) paiki yavude papiya athava krtaghnana matannu anusarisabediri
sanje mattu munjaneya vele nivu nim'ma odeyana nama smarane madiri
mattu irulalli avanige sastangaveragiri hagu irulina dhirgha bhagadalli avana pavitravannu japisiri
avaru begane siguvudannu (ihalokavannu) pritisuttare mattu tam'ma mundiruva (lokantyada) maha dinavannu kadeganisi biduttare
nave avarannu srstisiruvevu mattu avara sarirada gantugalannu bala padisiruvevu mattu navu bayasidare avara badalige avarantaha itararannu taraballevu
idondu upadesavagide. Ista ullavanu tanna odeyana kadegiruva dariyannu anusarisali
allahanu icchisuva tanaka nim'ma yava iccheyu nadeyadu. Allahanu khandita ellavannu ballavanu yuktivantanu agiruttane
Avanu tanicchisidavarannu tanna anugrahadolage serisikolluttane mattu akramigaligagi avanu kathina sikseyannu siddavagittiddane
nimagenannu vagdana madalagideyo adu khandita sambhavisalide
a tirpina dina enembudu nimagenu gottu
a balika navu mundinavarannu avara hinde nadesidevu
taruvaya navu adannu ondu suraksita sthaladallittevu
taruvaya navu (adara) pramanavannu niscayisidevu. Navu atyuttamavagi pramanavannu niscayisutteve
navu adarolage ettarada parvatagalannittiruvevu mattu nimage sihi nirannu kudisiruvevu
idiga, nivu yavudannu tiraskarisuttaliddiro adaredege nadeyiri
alli neralu iradu mattu agniya alinganadinda rakseyu iradu
Adu kotegala gatrada benkiya kidigalannu surisuttiruvudu
idu antima tirpina dina. (Indu) navu nim'mannu nim'ma hindinavarannu ottu serisiruvevu
nim'ma bali enadaru sancu iddare hudi nodiri
‘‘nivu madidda karmagala phalavagi, dharalavagi tinniri mattu kudiyiri’’ (endu avarodane helalaguvudu)
(dhikkarigale, ihalokadalli) alpavadhigagi tinniri mattu kudiyiri – nivu khandita aparadhigalagiruviri
‘‘(allahana munde) bagiri’’ endu avarodane helidaga avaru baguvudilla
andu vinasavide, (satyavannu) tiraskarisidavarige. 50. Idara (kur‌anina) balika, avarinnu yava matannu tane nambuvaru
